item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-19

  • I'm at Hi-Rise Bread Company (56 Brattle, Camridge). #
  • I'm at Whole Foods Alewife (200 Alewife Brook Parkway, Rindge Avenue, Cambridge). #
  • Off to grill over @ my brother-in-laws house. It's a perfect day for it! #
